alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 9:24AM CST until January 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. Cache River Near Patterson affecting Woodruff and Jackson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Roads in Henry Gray Hurricane Lake Wildlife Management area flooded. Thousands of acres of cultivated land flooded in White and Woodruff counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 28.3 Sat 9 AM 28.9 28.7 27.3 29.0 6 PM 1/23 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
